title: Gutanga mu rusengero rwa Orbital
heading: Uzuza impano yawe
chooseHow: Hitamo uburyo wifuza kuzuza imisoro-yakuweho imisoro:

option1.heading: Ihitamo 1: Tanga kumurongo nonaha
option1.description: Uzuza impano yawe ako kanya ukoresheje ikarita yinguzanyo, ikarita yo kubikuza, cyangwa ubundi buryo bwo kwishyura kumurongo ukoresheje umuterankunga wimari wizewe, The Field . Uzakira inyemezabwishyu yimisoro ako kanya.

option2.heading: Icya 2: Kubitsa Banki muri Fondasiyo ya Roy
option2.description: Kora banki itaziguye cyangwa wohereze insinga muri Roy Foundation , umufatanyabikorwa wacu wumuterankunga. Ihitamo ninziza kumpano nini cyangwa kohereza mpuzamahanga.
option2.instructions: Nyamuneka shyiramo " Urusengero rwa Orbital - {impano y'ubwoko} " murwego rwoherejwe. Nyuma yo kurangiza kwimura kwawe, twandikire kuri sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art hamwe namakuru yawe yoherejwe kugirango wakire inyemezabwishyu.

taxInfo.heading: Gutanga umusoro
taxInfo.description: Urusengero rwa Orbital ni umushinga uterwa inkunga na The Field (Performance Zone Inc) , umuryango 501 (c) (3) udaharanira inyungu. Intererano zose zo muri Amerika zirakurwaho umusoro ku buryo bwemewe n'amategeko.
